description: Plans for the "phased and safe" reopening will be released next week, the government says.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey extends school closures to 5 June
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey extends school closures to 5 June - BBC News
maintext: She said: "I would like to express my sincere thanks and pay tribute to our students, parents and carers for adapting so well to their new learning environments and working so hard during this unsettling and difficult period.
